text: 4.17: Ze 2.13; 1 Zo 2.28; 3.3; 3.19-21Nza khueŋ khothɨgi, Fhe Bakɨme guigira won ndavar gumgi gu mbigi ga ndɨɨv, guigira nza vuzvugi. Maaŋ muuŋgiap, mba tɨv vhɨra guigira havhargip nzan ki. Nza zumgum Fhe Bakɨme kha nuianan ki gumgi mbui tɨvi ga suaŋv mbe suanga tugar, nza Fhe Bakɨme nɨman rɨvɨrga fhu. Nza guigira kha nuianan ki. Nza anan kav, nza Krais ki kɨrɨ tɨvara muuŋgiap wari ki. Nza maaŋ muuŋgiap rɨvi fhu.
